com.generalnegentropics.archis.universe
Interface Probe

All Known Implementing Classes:
ChiSquareProbe, CompressibilityProbe, GenesisProbe
public interface Probe

A class enabling cells to be examined every tick

Version:
1.0
Author:
Adam Ierymenko

postTickNotify

public void postTickNotify()
Called after each tick

probeScanCell

public void probeScanCell(Cell cell)

Called each tick for each cell so stats can be detected

Note that this can be called by multiple threads concurrently and so anything it does should be properly synchronized.

Parameters:
cell - Cell to scan

probeNewCell

public void probeNewCell(Cell parent,
                         Cell newCell)
Called when a new cell is created

Parameters:
parent - Parent or null if none
newCell - New cell
